title: 28 Pranks Later
dialog: We wanna hit every house in Ponyville!

title: 28 Pranks Later
dialog: Hmm. The sewing machine cake is actually better than the cake cake.

title: 28 Pranks Later
dialog: What happened to all of our friends?

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: I thought we weren't going to wander off again.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: It's actually kind of sweet of him to help us out like this.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Come on, we've gone far enough! It's time to go back!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Poor Trouble Shoes. I can't believe those mean judges would laugh at him like that.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: That all depends on how you look at it.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: I don't know... All these events look a little, well, dangerous.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: But he never wanted to ruin any rodeos! Those were just bad accidents!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: But maybe we'll see you later.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: It's lucky we're all scared of the same things. That way we can help and remind each other to just be who we are!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: I'm glad she's happy, but I sure wouldn't want to be up to my flank in mane hair all day. Can you imagine getting stuck with a cutie mark you didn't like?

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Um, yeah... the thing is...

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: And we certainly don't have time to hang out at an old clubhouse.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Yeah. Apple Bloom, what's this all about?

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Pretty great they're letting you participate even though you're not technically sisters.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: It's sweet he wants to help you out like this. Weird, but sweet.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Hey, Apple Bloom, the Social's gonna start in a few hours. Thought you might want to go with us.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: That's awful nice of you to say, cousin Orchard Blossom! I've been told before I'm pretty observant.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: No, it means she's full of potential.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Let's see if there are any cookies.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: She could be a great scientist, or an amazing artist, or a famous writer. She could even be mayor of Ponyville someday.

title: Campfire Tales
dialog: We got to hear legendary stories and go on an adventure.

title: Campfire Tales
dialog: And I've got the bites to prove it.

title: Campfire Tales
dialog: Yup. This time, you only packed three suitcases.

title: Campfire Tales
dialog: I think she's my favorite legend too.

title: Campfire Tales
dialog: How? Our camp was so pretty, and this cave is so... not.

title: Campfire Tales
dialog: Wait a minute. All by himself?

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Not really, since we kind of overheard you yesterday.

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Especially where our playground equipment should be?

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Yeah, and I think that's way more important than worrying about our cutie marks, don't you?

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Well, if that's how you treat your best friend, then I choose Pipsqueak!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: And our journey here is never really done

title: Equestria Games
dialog: We tried to talk him into it...

title: Family Appreciation Day
dialog: And that gives me an idea!

title: Family Appreciation Day
dialog: Well, you can't run off... but maybe somepony else can!

title: Family Appreciation Day
dialog: Apple Bloom's sick! Looks like she might have to stay home all week!

title: Family Appreciation Day
dialog: Snap out of it. We're here to help you!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: But that's not true, Scootaloo!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Ms. Harshwhinny never said anything about that!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: I'm just too tired! I can't keep going!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: I can't believe you're quitting on us!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: But there's one problem! I bet everypony in class is planning to compete!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Not without you, Scootaloo.

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: I do not like them one bit.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: I kept meaning to ask her, I really did, but I worked so hard on this play. I wrote it especially for the three of us! I directed it, I'm in it, I made the costumes... It's just that this is really my time to shine doing something completely myself, and I really wanted to keep it that way!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: [muffled] At least Sapphire Shores won't be all like "Ooh, who fetched you that red ribbon? Because I don't care about anything else you made. All I care about is that amazing red ribbon!"

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: But you have to let us in! I'm Sapphire Shores' designer's sister! You have to believe us!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: But then I realized I didn't want your future to be ruined forever and ever, so I came back to change it before it was too late! So... here it is. It's all fixed. Please forgive me.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: No, they were perfect, and that was the whole problem!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: You gotta see this with the cinnamon ribbon! You'll love it!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Admit you made those dresses too good on purpose!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Funny, I thought I was the only one who got worried about stuff like that.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: How could you?! "Oh, what amazing dresses! Oh, how I love the dresses! Ooh, dresses, dresses, dresses, dresses!"

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Here we are, the stars of the show!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Finally, I was perfect, and then went to the stairs to enter like the belle of the ball. When I finally came out of my room, I found the party going on without me.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Forsooth and anon, I cometh forthwith and posthaste with glad tidings, miladies.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: [screams] I don't wanna see any more!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: She's been very busy lately!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Rarity? [gasps] Oh no! The box is... gone? I'm too late! She left for Canterlot!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Wait, come back! Luna? Can you hear me? Thank you for what you did! Help, Luna! Luuuna!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Oh, good! This is just a dream!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: [sighs] I hope everything goes alright for her tomorrow.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Look at the stitching, real close.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Don't act like you don't remember. Or are you trying to prove you're a better actress than me too?!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: At least everypony else who was able to stay loved it.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Oh, it just came to me... in a dream. I'm sorry I got jealous about those dresses. I know now that you were only trying to help.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Yes, good. Not jaw-dropping amazing!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Tomorrow night. For the opening night of our show!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Right... Well, I sure am happy to see you, and spending the day with you does sound like a lot of fun, but... I'm kind of right in the middle of something important. I have responsibilities and...

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Cutie Mark Crusaders mid-mission here!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Rarity, this is hard for me to say, but... um...

title: Forever Filly
dialog: [laughs nervously, sighs] That was, uh... one tasty bite. Still a little hungry, though.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: You don't still play with the same toys from when you were a foal, do you?

title: Forever Filly
dialog: [sighs] I dunno. It's no big deal. This is great.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: You sure you two can handle our client here?

title: Forever Filly
dialog: That's just it! I used to! That's not who I am anymore!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: You have the CMC guarantee! No matter what it takes, we promise you'll have our full attention.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Okay, Zipporwhill. What do you see?

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Hey, Zipporwhill. What are you doing here? Where are Apple Bloom and Scootaloo?

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Well, I do have one idea...

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Huh. I remember it being much bigger.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Oh. Right. From when I was a little filly.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Really?! If you still think I like doing this stuff, then maybe you don't know me at all!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Oh, um... I guess another scoop would be fine!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Pretty sure it's Zipporwhill. She needs help reconnecting with her cutie mark <U+0096> three puppy paw prints.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: I, um, guess I just prefer black box experimental theater.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Aww, Rarity! I love being with you too! That will never change! But... maybe we could just try to do different things together?

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Besides, I know exactly what to do! When I was younger, I read all the fairy tales.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: We're just gonna have to keep trying! Big Mac, are you ready to take it up a notch?

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: We're pretty sure she likes you! I mean, she keeps ordering apples just so she can see you again.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Hey, Apple Bloom! Rarity's reorganizing her shop, and look what she found! Old costumes from the talent show!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: It doesn't really count when you trick a pony into drinking a love potion, does it?

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Hey! That's our metaphorical sunset they're riding off into!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Well, I was younger on the way here!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: That's an awful long way for a pony to go, isn't it?

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: It was a long ride! Anyway, as long as we do what the book says, you're pretty much guaranteed a happy ending. Uh, how about this one? "Rescuing a damsel-pony-in-distress." That's perfect! Of course, we'll have to improvise without a dragon.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: So nothing fishy's going on.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Yeah. He totally blushed when you brought up how often he's been going to Starlight's old village.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: We may have given you the teeny-tiniest bit of love potion... that may have turned out to actually be a love poison, and you may have gone just a teeny-tiniest bit nutty.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Now we just need to keep them apart. I'll keep Miss Cheerilee occupied. You two do the same with Big Mac.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: I think they're gonna drink it.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Miss Cheerilee, are you alright?

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: If we can get Big Mac and Miss Cheerilee in a really romantic setting, I bet she'll ask him.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: This one looks nice. Better try it on though.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: They aren't really gonna get married. They're just gonna get ready to get married.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Well nothing's wrong with this one, He seems alright...

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: How could somepony as amazing as you not have a very special somepony on Hearts and Hooves Day?

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Now it can't be just anypony. Miss Cheerilee is one of the best mares in Ponyville. She deserves to have one of the best stallions as her very special somepony.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Punch! We made punch. We were gonna set up a stand and try to sell it but, heh, we needed somepony to taste-test it first.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: I'm more than all right. I've just come up with the best idea ever. We're gonna find Miss Cheerilee a very special somepony.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: If we can keep Miss Cheerilee and Big Mac from looking into each other's eyes for one full hour, the love curse will be broken.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: [sigh] Either way, we failed.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Gosh, you two are so in love, the next thing you know, you'll be getting married.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Of course it will work. They're perfect for each other.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: What's wrong? Where's Apple Bloom? Where's Big Mac?

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Too strangely obsessed with tubs of jelly.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: With her new very special somepony.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: I... don't suppose we could borrow that book for a little while, do ya?

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: We did it girls, We've found the one, Who will send our teacher's heart aflutter!

title: Just for Sidekicks
dialog: Awww, little fluffy Angel Bunny-kins! You're so cute! The natural weaves in his fluff are to die for!

title: Just for Sidekicks
dialog: I wish I were dressed for it, but still... [squealing] THE CRYSTAL EMPIRE!

title: Just for Sidekicks
dialog: Isn't Angel just the cutest thing you've ever seen?!

title: Just for Sidekicks
dialog: There has to be a better solution!

title: Just for Sidekicks
dialog: Without seeing the palace!

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: I really like her... mane?

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: I really... like her... mane.

title: Make New Friends but Keep Discord
dialog: [singsong] We're plus-ones!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Rumble, stop! That's just not true!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Trying to find out what you're meant to do can be frustrating. You remember how long it took us to get our cutie marks?

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: The Cutie Mark Crusaders are pleased to announce today's special guest <U+0096> Thunderlane!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Wow. I can't believe we got a cutie mark on the first day!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: [yelling] Cutie marks... make you... special!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Well, that certainly is... round.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Everypony wants to know what they're meant to do!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Kettle Corn, you covered your cutie mark?!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: That would be perfect! We'd save time and they could help each other!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: That's silly. Having a cutie mark doesn't mean you can't do other things.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: I can't believe Rumble isn't interested in getting his cutie mark either, but we can't force him.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Well, we're excited too! At Cutie Mark Day Camp, you'll be able to try all kinds of things!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: We know you'll get your cutie mark. Everypony does.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Can't you just give us a chance?

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: We wanna learn friendship!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Aww. She looks so sad. We better go see what's wrong.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Or how Twilight could blame us for it!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Green, purple, yellow. And one more purple. Whew. Sorting all those took longer than I thought.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: At least she likes her present?

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: That sounds like a closet.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: [stiltedly] You are so careless! [quietly] Good plan, Apple Bloom!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: [whispering] Rarity says there's never been a school like it!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Please can I go to Twilight's school?!

title: On Your Marks
dialog: Don't worry, you'll be just fine!

title: On Your Marks
dialog: A place where we faced all kinds of cutie mark problems!

title: On Your Marks
dialog: Like when there's something one of us wants to do that the others don't.

title: On Your Marks
dialog: Oh! I'm sorry, Apple Bloom. I was distracted by the radiance of my cutie mark... Did you say something?

title: On Your Marks
dialog: I don't think Rarity would let me travel to the far reaches of Equestria looking for cutie mark problems.

title: On Your Marks
dialog: The problem boils down to this <U+0096> we don't need to go out and do things anymore to get our cutie marks.

title: On Your Marks
dialog: I can't believe you tried all this stuff and didn't find one thing you liked!

title: On Your Marks
dialog: Well, we used to only do stuff to get our cutie marks or fulfill our destiny, but now we don't have to.

title: On Your Marks
dialog: So... what's your cutie mark problem?

title: On Your Marks
dialog: Huh. So now that we don't have to do stuff to get our cutie marks, what is it that the Cutie Mark Crusaders actually do?

title: On Your Marks
dialog: And it's totally normal to feel confused and maybe even a little lost. But being a blank flank is nothing to be ashamed of.

title: On Your Marks
dialog: Just as soon as you figure out what it is.

title: On Your Marks
dialog: [tapping with baton] And a-one, and a-two, and a-one two three!

title: One Bad Apple
dialog: We need to talk to Applejack.

title: One Bad Apple
dialog: I'm just so excited I could burst!

title: One Bad Apple
dialog: We could always tell Applejack.

title: One Bad Apple
dialog: And we figured out you were just doing it to avoid getting picked on in Ponyville. But, by then... we were the ones being bullies. And... Oh, why does life have to be so ironic?!

title: One Bad Apple
dialog: Isn't it smashing? No! I-I didn't mean smashing! I mean... Isn't it a hit? No! No, I- No! No hitting! I meant<U+0096>

title: One Bad Apple
dialog: This is gonna be the best week of your life!

title: One Bad Apple
dialog: Teach her to fool with the Cutie Mark Crusaders!

title: One Bad Apple
dialog: We have to tell Applejack!

title: One Bad Apple
dialog: The Summer Harvest Parade's going on while you're here! You'll get to ride in a float!

title: One Bad Apple
dialog: But it's booby tra<U+0096>

title: One Bad Apple
dialog: [tired] Good, 'cause we'd better get out of here before Babs finds us.

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Hey, everypony! The show is starting!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Your friends would wanna read the Foal Free Press?

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Scootaloo? Do you have anything?

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Are you snooping through my saddlebag?

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: But this could be our last chance to earn our cutie marks! If we really are supposed to be journalists, isn't it worth a little grief?

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: We gave up too quickly, girls. Forget trying to squeeze stories out of this school. We need to expand!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Can you believe Featherweight got his cutie mark? Featherweight! Before us!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Can you please keep it down with all the laughter? I'm trying to<U+0096> hey!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: We're sorry, Diamond Tiara, but we've made our decision.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: To the citizens of Ponyville,

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: We couldn't fit all of our names, so we decided to create one for all three of us.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: [giggles] Hey, Featherweight, c'mere! [giggles] Take a few pictures of this, then meet me during lunch. Girls, I have our story.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: We'll need to tell Featherweight to start working overtime.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: But the gossip we've been printing is hurting everypony's feelings!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: We've ruined all of our friendships and we still don't have our cutie marks!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: What's an editor-in-chief?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Rarity, you have to help me! I think something's wrong with my horn!

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Cozy Glow did all of this? How? Why?

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: What happened?! Is everything all right?! Where's Cozy Glow?!

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: But Starlight's trapped here, and there's no way to get word to Celestia or anypony else!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Geez Louise, can't I do anything right?

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: [mimicking Rarity] Why, it's smashing!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: That sounds like the perfect way for us to hang out! Rarity will think it's an excellent idea.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Oh hello, un-sister. What are you doing here? Better be careful, you might get some dust on you.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: It's not just the Social. She thinks I'm uncouth.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: I just wanted to do something nice for my sister.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: So, we did the whole competition... together?

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Rarity! I thought you said I was gonna help!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: I'll go with you and help!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: No problem, I'll make myself useful!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Thank you, Applejack! You were amazing! I don't even care that we didn't win. This was so much fun! Huh? Rarity?! Wait, where's Applejack?

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: A sister is someone who loves and takes care of another sister. Applejack's a real sister.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: You mean... you were all in on it?

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Um, okay. Ow! You're right, it is hard work.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: I never got in trouble for drawing. Hmm. This needs something...

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: You sure you want me to help? I just mess everything up!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: But every time I make a mess, you get upset!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: But, I thought it would make you happy!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Hi, Rarity! I made a special drawing for y<U+0096>

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: That's the last word Rarity would use. [mimicking Rarity] Oh my, what a repulsive monstrosity! This thing needs a head to toe makeover!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Hm! You want me to go home with you, so we can do what you wanna do?

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: See? Told you she'd wanna go.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: I call sister teams! Last herd to make it to the falls is a moldy carrot!

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: And I'll get Rarity to come too! Rarity loves camping!

title: Slice of Life
dialog: Maybe it's just a friendship problem, and it'll all be cleared up in half an hour or so.

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Why, that sounds delightful!

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Totally. Even though it could change everything for you, forever and ever!

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: It must've been hours ago.

title: Stare Master
dialog: Yup. And look. I lined them with this special gold silk. It took sooo long to make, but I think it adds just the right touch, don't you?

title: Stare Master
dialog: And... look what I made us!

title: Stare Master
dialog: But you could go with us and we could catch those creatures. We could be, umm... creature catchers!

title: Stare Master
dialog: Who wants a picture of a hammer on their flank anyway?

title: Stare Master
dialog: We're sorry we snuck out of the house and into the forest.

title: Stare Master
dialog: Okay, so what kind of crusading do we do next?

title: Stare Master
dialog: Um, I-I'll just go and stand over there, where I'll be... out of the way.

title: Stare Master
dialog: Hush now! Quiet now! It's time to lay your sleepy head! Said hush now! Quiet now! It's time to go to bed!

title: Stare Master
dialog: And, and, and, we, um<U+0097> yeah! What they said!

title: Stare Master
dialog: Um ... that doesn't look like a table.

title: Stare Master
dialog: Thanks to that stare of yours.

title: Stare Master
dialog: Are you sure I can't help? I could<U+0097>

title: Stare Master
dialog: Cutie Mark Crusader chicken herders! Yay!

title: Stare Master
dialog: Halt, dangerous creature of the Everfree Forest. I am Sweetie Belle, the creature catcher, and I'm here to catch you!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Thank goodness that the Cutie Mark Crusaders have begun To give you hope and help you to decide

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Well, it's obvious, isn't it? Mount Aris is the best of all possible worlds. Pro <U+0096> it's beautiful. Con <U+0096> too far from Equestria. I think that pretty much sums it up.

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Woo-hoo! Yeah! Awesome! I love this!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Shhh! It's rude to ask a question like that!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: ...we just ended up confusing you more. It's all our fault.

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: You really don't need to come with us, Twilight. We can take care of this mission just fine on our own.

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Huh. Not much sunlight down here, is there?

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: This is absolutely the best place ever! You are so lucky!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Ohhhh. I-I didn't know that.

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: We thought we'd get every creature together for a picnic on the beach.

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Wow! That's almost... off the table!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: I don't know if I'd like being a Hippogriff. Part bird, part pony...

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: It seems like everypony's got somepony special but us.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: [chomp] [reading] "Happy Hearts and Hooves Day, Sugar Belle. Meet me<U+0097>"

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Oh, it's funny. I've been sitting here feeling sorry for myself for not having a special pony on Hearts and Hooves Day. But remembering all the fun we had, I think I have two special ponies <U+0096> my two best friends.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: [to Snips and Snails] Happy Hearts and Hooves Day! Did you boys happen to send any packages to me recently? It's okay to say no! I won't be offended! [whispering] Please say no, please say no, please say no.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: But we worked so hard on this chart. I think we've almost cracked it. If you could just<U+0097>

title: The Cart Before the Ponies
dialog: Doesn't look like any of us ended up with what we wanted.

title: The Cart Before the Ponies
dialog: Um, Miss Cheerilee? That sounds a bit over our heads.

title: The Cart Before the Ponies
dialog: First they built the carts, now they're gonna drive them?!

title: The Cart Before the Ponies
dialog: I'm sure they meant "our" carts. Like, the team cart, right?

title: The Cart Before the Ponies
dialog: Wow! Have you seen what the carts used to look like in the olden days?

title: The Cart Before the Ponies
dialog: Sure! The race is the best part!

title: The Cart Before the Ponies
dialog: And I can win the award for most traditional!

title: The Cart Before the Ponies
dialog: The Derby was supposed to be for us, not the three of you! Now you've ruined it for everypony!

title: The Cart Before the Ponies
dialog: You? Second in most creative? To whom?!

title: The Cart Before the Ponies
dialog: Well, it doesn't have to be yellow. But I really do love the old-timey style. Like this.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Maybe we should do something less dangerous, like pillow testing or flower sniffing.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Oh, come on. She's just being Pinkie Pie.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: [gulp] Are you sure about this, Scootaloo? I've never even heard of a pony zip lining before.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: We're happy for you, Twilight.

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: The Bowling Dolls! That's it!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Yeah! So what if your talent is potion making?

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: You're too kind, Apple Bloom.

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: [muffled] Whooo! [spits out bag] I mean, yaay!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: A treat from Sugarcube Corner will cheer you up.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
dialog: Guess we'll never know for sure unless we give it a try.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
dialog: Aaaaand... she's off again.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
dialog: We just can't figure out what one thing you're supposed to do.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
dialog: I thought we could help anypony.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
dialog: But since we are the Cutie Mark Crusaders, we made you one anyway. Behold!

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
dialog: Um, I think maybe that could've been clearer.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
dialog: Excited? But whatever for?

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
dialog: Though I'm pretty sure it doesn't happen to griffons. Or if it does, we've never ever heard of it.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
dialog: Gabby, we're your friends. Why in Equestria are you running away from us?

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
dialog: Or how about singing? I just love to sing! La-la-la-la!

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
dialog: Crusaders, this is terrible! Gabby really believed in us. And now, we're gonna let her down.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
dialog: Now, Scootaloo, you do know there will always be challenges? Someday, somepony might even come to us with a problem that even we can't handle. Like, say...

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
dialog: So Scootaloo's keeping Petunia busy like you asked. What did you two want to talk about?

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Heard any good gossip today?

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: Then it's settled! Let's get started.

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: You know what would be the best? If we won and we got our cutie marks.

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: They all say that you will get your mark When the time is really right

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: There? Where? What? I don't even know what we're doing.

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: Oh, it can't be that bad. "With our cutie marks we'll rock Equestria. We use our stomachs to... digestia"? Umm... Well... These are... um... good, but... How about after "we fight the fight"... There is nothing that we fear We'll have to figure out what we'll do next 'Til our cutie marks are here

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: Come back! Come back! Uh. Dumb fabric. Hey, Scoot! How's the song going?

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: What? No way I'm singing in front of a crowd. Twilight said to do something we like to do, and I'd like to be like my big sister, and she's a designer.

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: No, no, no. You see, in the theater it's considered bad luck to say "good luck". So you say "break a leg" instead.

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: [moan] I'll never be a designer like my sister Rarity.

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: I've never been here before.

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: Me too. You think we're ready?

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: Yeah. Instructions on how to use six wooden planks, four-by-eight plywood, a box of nails, four cans of paint, and four brushes.

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: Me too. Um... so what are we doing again?

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Oh, we're gonna look sad all right...

title: Twilight Time
dialog: This way! I know a shortcut!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Oh, yeah?! Well, I don't have to go all the way to Manehattan to hang out with the famous and super-cool ponies! Me and my friends hang out with Princess Twilight all the time!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: [gasps] [out of breath] We... made... it... Quick! Knock on<U+0096>

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Um... a-actually, no. We didn't have a chance to ask Twilight, so<U+0096>

title: Twilight Time
dialog: What's tricky about inviting Twilight out for a meal thanking her for all the nice things she's done for us? Seems like the least we can do for the princess!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Okay! But stay out of sight!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: But don't you get it? They'll have to learn something too!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: When I told you when you could come eyeball the princess at one of her favorite hangouts, I said only two or three of you, tops!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Apple Bloom doesn't have her apple seed with her, so she'll just grab an apple from the kitchen. And I will begin by using my magic to lift this broom!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: I guess Twilight must not be so super-upset anymore, 'cause she's letting us do a diary entry like our sisters do. Boy, did we get our priorities messed up. We started acting special because we were friends with someone special. We almost forgot the real reason she's special <U+0096> because she's our friend. But she forgave us, and, like magic, things are good as new! That's the kind of magic I really want to get good at, now that I'm getting so good at the other kind.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Hey, come to think of it, if we get really good at the stuff Twilight's teaching us, we could be the big shots around here for a change! Hmm...

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Nope. Ready to give it a shot!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Unfortunately, since we don't have Scootaloo's unicycle parts, she'll take apart and put back together one of the scooters from outside.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: We wanted our time together just as a way to be with you and learn new things. Really and truly!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Of awesome! Don't you see? We're really and truly and certifiably the biggest of the big shots in school right now!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Now remember, Twilight takes this time out with us so we can learn stuff.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: They all think we're the greatest, because we're their ticket to get time with Ponyville's newest and biggest celebrity, Princess Twilight!
